external_games.name: A Kristus Story: A Night Market Holiday Tale

name: A Kristus Story: A Night Market Holiday Tale
summary: It's the most wonderful time of the year and Yule is in full swing within the Night Market. Join your choice of characters during the festive season and unlock the secrets of Kristus within Artisan Alley. Will you show compassion? Will you understand the motives behind the season? Or will you kill a snowman? It's all up to you in this 87k interactive short.
